description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Welcome to Jungle Friendzy, a hysterical online team deathmatch sporting cartoony graphics and three unique classes, each with it's own set of abilities. Wreak havoc using an array of amusing weaponry including a Bee-cannon and a Carnivorous plant.   Bring your friends and team up against the indie community! Visit us at Junglefriendzy.com for news and to discuss the game and arrange matches.
